overview: Charming Tom is pursuing fine Olivia both cheerfully and stubbornly.  At first, she rejects him brutally; but then she finds pleasure in this intrusive guy, who’s following her everywhere. They spend an evening together; but afterwards, Olivia determines, that a valuable bracelet has been stolen from her.  Now she thinks Tom is the infamous jewel thief, who’s been terrorizing the neighborhood.
title: Verliebtes Abenteuer
